plot: Luke is bored one day, and decides to get up and find an adventure. He explores around local towns and farmlands, then he meets a very interesting person.
title: Anyplace
plot_es: Luke is bored one day, and decides to get up and find an adventure. He explores around local towns and farmlands, then he meets a very interesting person.
